remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法对一个或多个序列; 中的数据点执行自定义排序通过定义排序逻辑`comparer`参数。This method performs a custom sort on the data points in one or more series; the sort logic is defined by the `comparer` parameter. 重写并实现方法接口，进行比较，然后返回`true`或`false`。Override and implement the method of the interface, perform the comparison(s) and then return `true` or `false`. 由返回的值确定排序顺序。The sort order is determined by the return value. 请注意，是否多个序列进行排序，序列必须对齐，否则将引发异常。Note that if multiple series are sorted, the series must be aligned, otherwise an exception will be thrown. 两个对象的参数方法的类型必须始终为。The two object parameters of the method must always be of type . > [!IMPORTANT] > 所有数据点，而不考虑它们属于的系列上的第一个序列; 根据进行都排序如果第一个序列中的数据点的位置发生更改，其他序列中的所有相应点也进行更改。All data points, regardless of the series they belong to, are sorted based on the first series; if the position of a data point in the first series changes, all corresponding points in the other series change as well.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法执行按升序或降序排序的数据点在一系列，并基于中设置的值`sortBy`参数，例如"X"、"AxisLabel"、"Y"、"Y1"等。This method performs an ascending or descending sort on data points in a series, and is based on the value that is set in the `sortBy` parameter such as "X", "AxisLabel", "Y", "Y1", and so forth. 请注意，是否多个序列进行排序，序列必须对齐，否则将引发异常。Note that if multiple series are sorted, the series must be aligned, otherwise an exception will be thrown. > [!IMPORTANT] > 将使用指定排序的所有序列从第一个 Y 值列出系列;也就是说，所有数据点，而不考虑它们属于的序列进行都排序基于第一个序列。All series will be sorted using the specified Y-value from the FIRST listed series; that is, all data points, regardless of the series they belong to, are sorted based on the first series. 若要对各点使用自定义排序例程，使用此重载方法的不同定义。To sort points using a custom sort routine, use a different definition of this overloaded method.
